In this episode of Sin Fronteras we continue our tour of the Maltese capital. Valletta, like any city, has its unique identity. We'll discover some of the sites that make this city so attractive to visotors. We shall visit The Cathedral of San Juan, get to know the city's architecture and its very peculiar balconies and admire some of the key sites, which should not miss when you visit this beautiful island.
